src_text: Kabinete e ne e tshwere kopano ya yona ka la bo, 6 Seetebosigo 2018, kwa Tuynhuys, Motsekap Merero ya ga Jaanong1.
trg_text: Cabinet met on Wednesday, 6 June 2018, at the Union Buildings, Pretori Issues in the environment1.Economy Cabinet has noted the decline of 2,2% in the Gross Domestic Product (GDP) in the first quarter of 2018.

src_text: IkonomiKabinete e etse tlhoko go wa ga Seelosotlhe sa Ditlhagisiwa tsa Naga mo Ngwageng (GDP) ka 2,2% mo kotareng ya ntlha ya ngwaga wa 2018.
trg_text: Saharawi Arab Democratic Republic State VisitPresident Cyril Ramaphosa hosted his Saharawi Arab Democratic Republic counterpart, Brahim Ghali, on 4 June 2018 during a State Visit to the countrCabinet expresses its solidarity with the people of Saharawi in their fight for independence and calls on the international community to provide the necessary support to the people of Saharaw Messages23.

src_text: Lefapha la Dipalopalo la Aforika Borwa (StatsSA) le rebotse dipalo tseno mo bekeng en Diintaseteri tsa temothuo, meepo le tlhagisodikuno di nnile le seabe mo go weleng tlase gono mo kotareng eno ya ntlh Kabinete e laetse Ditona tsa Maphata a Ikonomi go tshwara kopano ka lepotlapotla go buisana ka ditharabololo mabapi le dipalo tsen
trg_text: Statistics South Africa (StatsSA) released the figures this wee The agriculture, mining and manufacturing industries contributed to the decline in this first quarte Cabinet has mandated the Economic Cluster Ministers to urgently meet to discuss the way forward with regard to these figure

src_text: Ditlamorago tsa GDP di tlisa mo mogopolong tlhokego ya gore makala otlhe a naga a tshwanetse go dirisana mmogo go tshegetsa ikonomi ya fa gae ya Aforika Borw Bagwebi le mekgatlho ya badiri ba tshwanetse go tswelela go dirisana mmogo mo go tshegetseng matsholo a a jaaka Leano la Dintlharobongwe go tlhotlha kgolo ya ikonomi le ditiro tse di tlhokegan Le lengwe la diikokotletlo tsa lona ke Leanotiro la Pholisi ya Diintaseteri (IPAP), leo le tsepamisitseng mogopolo wa lona mo go oketseng
trg_text: The GDP results bring into sharp focus the need for all sectors of the country to work together to support South Africa s local econom Business and labour need to continue to work with government in support of initiatives such as the Nine-Point Plan to stimulate economic growth and create much-needed job One of its key pillars is the Industrial Policy Action Plan (IPAP), which focuses on increasing manufacturing, employment creation and export Cabinet is confident that the IPAP will help grow our industrial sector and economLater this year, government will host an International Investment Summit to profile South Africa as an investment destinatio The aim of the event is to work towards generating R1,2 trillion in new investments over the next five years, which will have a significant impact on economic growth and employment creation Investments Cabinet welcomes the launch of a new world-class factory that manufactures information and communications technology products in East London in the Eastern Cape on 5 June 2018 by Yekani Manufacturing, a wholly black-owned compan This R1-billion investment will create 1 000 new quality jobs in addition to the existing workforce of 450, mostly youth and womeThis investment has benefited from both the Special Economic Zone Infrastructure Incentive and the Black Industrialist Scheme (BIS).

src_text: tlhagisodikuno, go tlhola ditiro mmogo le diromelwantl Kabinete e na le tshepo ya gore
trg_text: supported by the SAPS air wing, continuous cordon and search operations, roadblocks and relentless search for wanted suspects

src_text: IPAP e tla thusa go godisa makala a diintaseteri le a ikonomKwa bofelong jwa monongwaga, puso e tla tshwara Samiti e e ka ga Dipeeletso ya Bodit habat haba go bua bontle ka Aforika Borwa jaaka lefelo leo go ka beelediwang mo go lon Maitlhomo a mokete ono ke go bokeletsa matlole a le kanaka R1,2 trilione a dipeeletso tse dint hwa mo dingwageng tse di tlang di le tlhano, e leng seo se tla nnang le seabe se se tonagadi mo kgolong ya ikonomi le mo go tlholeng diphatlhatiro DipeeletsoKabinete e amogetse thankgololo ya feme e nt hwa ya maemo a a kwa godimo e e tlhagisang ditlhagisiwa tsa Thekenoloji ya Ditlhaeletsano le Tshedimosetso (ICT) kwa East London kwa Kapa Botlhaba ka la bo 5 Seetebosigo
trg_text: The BIS saw the Department of Trade and Industry (the dti) approving incentive support to 103 black industrialists over the previous two financial year Forty-eight companies were also provided with market access support, eight of which are in the Eastern Cape National Minimum Wage (NMW)Cabinet welcomes the passing of the NMW Bill by the National Assembl It expresses its appreciation to all stakeholders at the National Economic Development and Labour Council for their role in reaching this agreemen This begins a process towards narrowing the wage gap, especially for the low income earner Approximately 6,4 million workers in South Africa will benefit once the Bill has been signed into la Cabinet, however, acknowledges that more work still needs to be done to close the wage disparities that still exist in the countr The Bill will now be sent to the National Council of Provinces for concurrence before the President signs it into law Basic servicesCabinet is pleased with the results of the Non-financial Census of Municipalities 2017 released by StatsS The results showed more consumers have received free basic services such as electricity, water and sanitation in 2017 as compared with 2016.

src_text: 2018 ya Yekani Manufacturing, e leng setlamo se se laolwang ke batho ba bantsho ka nos Peeletso eno ya bokanaka R1 bilione e tla tlhoma ditiro di le 1 000 tse dint hwa e bile di le boleng mo godimo ga badiri ba ga jaanong ba leng teng ba le kanaka 450, bao bontsi jwa bone e leng ba wa le basad Peeletso eno e unngwetswe go tswa mo maphateng ka bobedi e leng la Thusokamatlole ya Mafaratlhatlha a Mafelo a a Itlhophileng a Ikonomi mmogo le la Sekema sa Borradiintaseteri ba Bathobatsho (BIS).
trg_text: Cabinet approved for the submission of the 2016/17 report on the performance of the Research and Development (R&D) Tax-Incentive Programme to Parliamen The incentive programme has enabled companies to diversify their R&D portfolio, generate intellectual property and create new product The incentive programme, which was introduced in November 2006, is being implemented by the Department of Science and Technology together with the South African Revenue Service and National Treasur From March 2016 to February 2017, a total of 153 R&D tax-incentive applications were received from 117 companies, 58 of which were first-time applicant The applications were for 571 R&D projects worth an estimated R3,6 billio Cabinet is pleased with the growth in the number of companies that invest in R&D and continues to call on business to invest more in R&D, which remains an important pillar of our efforts to grow the econom 15.

src_text: BIS e dirile gore Lefapha la Kgwebisano le Intaseteri (dti) le letlelele borradiintaseteri ba bathobatsho ba le 103 ba tlamelwe ka thuso ya matlole mo dingwageng di le pedi tse di fetilen Ditlamo di le 48 le tsone di tlametswe ka tshegetso ya gore di kgone go fitlhelela bareki, mme di le robedi tsa tsone di kwa Kapa Botlhaba Mogolo o o kwa Tlase wa Boset haba (NMW)Kabinete e amogetse go phasisiwa ga Molaotlhomo wa NMW ke Kokoanotheomolao ya Boset hab E leboga gape le Lekgotla la Boset haba la Tlhabololo ya Ikonomi le la Mekgatlho ya Badiri mabapi le seabe sa ba nnileng le sone mo go fitlheleleng tumelano en Kgato eno e simolotse thulaganyo ya go fokotsa sekgala se se leng teng mo megolong, bogolosegolo mo bathong bao ba golang megolo e e kwa tlas Badiri ba ka nna 6,4 milione mo Aforika Borwa ba tla ungwelwa gang fa Molaotlhomo ono o sena go saenelwa gore e nne mola Kabinete, le fa go le jalo, e a dumela gore go gontsi go go santseng go tshwanelwa ke gore go diriwe go tswala sekgala se se santseng se le teng mo megolong mo nageng ya ronotlhomo ono jaanong o tla romelwa kwa Lekgotleng la Boset haba la Diporofense (NCOP) pele Moporesitente a ka o saena gore e nne molao Ditirelo tsa MotheoKabinete e itumedisitswe ke dipoelo tsa Dipalopalo tse e seng sa Matlole tsa Dimasepala tsa 2017 tse di rebotsweng ke Lefapha la Mananepalo la Aforika Borwa (statsSA).
trg_text: North WestCabinet received a third progress report from the Inter-Ministerial Task Team (IMTT) on North Wes Cabinet is satisfied with the progress made to operationalise the invoked Section 100(1) (a) and (b) in the North West provincial department It was further approved that the IMTT will onwards report to Cabinet once a month to enable the teams deployed in the province to continue with the worCabinet endorsed a visit to the North West on 7 June 2018 to brief the North West Executive, Provincial Legislature and the external auditors responsible for the province Protest action Cabinet condemns the recent violent protests around the country, and is especially saddened by the acts of violence and intimidation of patients and medical staff at the Charlotte Maxeke Johannesburg Academic Hospita Protestors who exercise their rights to protest should do so without violating the rights of others, particularly the vulnerabl No amount of grievance justifies violence and the threatening behaviour seen in the past week Safety and securityCabinet welcomes and supports the

src_text: Dipoelo tseno di supa gore badirisi ka bontsi ba ditirelo ba abetswe ditirelo tsa motheo tse di sa duelelweng tse di jaaka motlakase, metsi le kgeleloleswe mo ngwageng wa 2017 fa go bapisiwa le tsa mo ngwageng wa 2016.
trg_text: Youth Month Cabinet urges all South Africans to play their part in youth-empowerment programmes and projects during Youth Month in Jun This year is the centenary of Tata Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela and Mama Albertina Nontsikelelo Sisulu and Youth Month 2018 is embraced under the theme:

src_text: Puso e tswelela ka maikemisetso a yona a go abela baagi ba yona botlhe ka ditirelo tsa letsatsi le letsatsi tsa motheo, bogolosegolo bao ba humanegilen Porojeke ya se weng e e tsamaelanang le tsa metsi ke Porojeke ya Metsi ya
trg_text: Government remains committed to providing daily basic services to all its citizens, especially poor peopl The most recent water-related project is the R96-million Mhlathuze Water Project in Richards Bay in KwaZulu-Natal, which will deliver running tap water to more than 6 000 households Public Service wage negotiationsCabinet received a briefing from the Minister of Public Service and Administration on the Public Service wage negotiation Cabinet appreciates the commitment by all stakeholders in finding an amicable solution that would benefit all role player Cabinet reaffirms government s commitment to fully engage with labour so as to arrive at a workable deal for all involved Social grants Cabinet reassures beneficiaries of social grants that government will continue providing this important service, as mandated by the Constitution of the Republic of South Africa of 1996.

src_text: Mhlathuze e e jeleng bokanaka R96 milione kwa Richards Bay mo KwaZulu-Natal, e e tla tsenyang dipompo tsa metsi mo malapeng a feta 6 00 Dipuisanelo tsa dituelelo tsa megolo mo tirelopusongKabinete e amogetse tsopolelo go tswa mo Toneng ya Lefapha la Bodiredipuso le Tsamaiso (DPSA) e e ka ga dipuisanelo tsa dituelelo tsa megolo mo tirelopuson Kabinete e leboga maikemisetso a bannaleseabe botlhe a a ka ga go ka bona tharabololo e e ka kgotsofatsang maphata otlh Kabinete e gatelela maikano a puso a go buisana ka botlalo le mekgatlho ya badiri gore go fitlhelelwe tharabololo e e namatshang mo maphateng otlhe a a amegang Madi a loagoKabinete e netefaletsa bao ba unngwelwang mo lenaaneng la madi a loago gore puso e tla tswelela go abelana ka tirelo eno e e botlhokwa thata eno, jaaka e laetswe ke Molaotheo wa Rephaboliki ya Aforika Borwa waa 1996.
trg_text: Cabinet approved the National Health Insurance (NHI) Bill of 2018 to be published in the Government Gazette for public commen The Bill seeks to establish the NHI Fund of South Africa, as a public entity, so as to provide for a sustained universal health access that is affordable and of high qualit It also sets out its functions, powers and dutieThe Bill provides a framework for the active purchasing of healthcare services by the fund on behalf of users and creates mechanisms for the equitable, effective and efficient use of the resources of the fund to meet the health needs of user The Minister of Health will next week hold a full media briefing to unpack this Bil Cabinet approved for the introduction of the Science and Technology Laws Amendment Bill of 2017 to Parliamen The Bill harmonizes the provisions which regulate the operations and governance of the public entities that report to the Minister of Science and Technolog This will ensure consistency in all requirements to be met and processes to be followe

src_text: Madi a loago a tla tswelela go duelelwa mme gape thulaganyo ya go abelana ka dikarata tsa go gola tse dint hwa tsa Setheo sa Tshireletso ya Loago sa Aforika Borwa (SASSA) le yona e tla tswelela fela jalo go fitlha kwa bokhutlhong jwa Lwetse 2018.Tirisanommogo magareng ga SASSA le Kantoroposo ya Aforika Borwa (SAPO) le yona e tlisa dipoelo tse di itumedisang ka ntlha ya fa re bona batho ba le bantsi bao ba unngwelwang mo lenaaneng la madi a loago ba ntse ba busa dikarata tsa bona tsa kgale mme ba neelwa dikarata tse dint hwKabinete e ikuela mo baaging go se ise tlhogong melaetsakhutshwe eo e ntseng e romelwa baagi bao ba unngwelwang mo lenaaneng la madi a loago ya gore ba tshwanetswe go ikwadisa se wa gore ba kgone go tswelela go amogela megolo ya bon Melaetsa e e fosagetseng e e jaaka eo e leka go fetlha tlhakatlhakano mo baaging ba rona ba ba humanegileng mmogo le go tlhakatlhakanya puso gore e retelelwe ke go netefatsa gore megolo e tswelela go duelelwa ka tolamo ntle le kgorelesego epe Bokone BophirimaKabinete e amogetse pegelo ya boraro go tswa kwa Setlhophatirong sa Ditona tsa Mafapha a a Kopanetseng Tiro (IMTT) mabapi le porofense ya Bokone Bophirim Kabinete e kgotsofaditswe ke kgatelopele e e dirilweng ya go tsenyatirong Kgaolo ya bo
trg_text: Science and TechnologyCabinet notes astrological developments over the past weekend when astronomers working with the Catalina Sky Survey in Arizona, USA, discovered a small asteroid (2018 LA) near the orbit of the Moon, which hours later made contact with Eart The resultant explosion which sent waves of low-frequency sound (infrasound) rippling through the atmosphere were detected by an infrasound monitor in South Africa, which was deployed as part of the International Monitoring System of the Comprehensive Nuclear-Test-Ban Treat This highlights the growing capability of modern sky surveys to discover asteroids targeting Earth and South Africa s internationally recognised capabilit

src_text: 100(1) (a) le (b) mo mafapheng a porofense ya Bokone Bophirim Go ne gape ga amogelwa gore go simolola jaanong
trg_text: It is mandated to mobilise resources for infrastructure and sustainable development projects in BRICS and other emerging economies and developing countries, complementing the efforts of multilateral and regional financial institutions for global growth and developmen AppointmentsAll appointments are subject to the verification of qualifications and the relevant clearanc Reappointment of Mr Ebrahim Mohamed as the Commissioner of the National Consumer Commissio

src_text: IMTT e tla tshwanelwa ke go begela Kabinete ka kgatelopele gangwe mo kgweding go kgontsha ditlhopha tse di rometsweng kwa porofenseng go tswelela pele ka tiro ya bonKabinete e neseditse pula leeto la go leba kwa Bokone Bophirima ka la bo 7 Seetebosigo 2018 la go buisana le Khuduthamaga ya Bokone Bophirima, Peomolao ya Porofense mmogo le baruni ba kwa ntle ga porofense bao ba nang le maikarabelo ka ga porofense DitshupetsoKabinete e kgalema ka mafoko a a bogale ditshupetso tsa se weng tse go neng go dirisiwa dikgoka mo go tsona go ralala le naga, mme e bile e swabisitswe nko go feta molo ke ditiragalo tsa dikgoka le go tshosetsa balwetse le dingaka kwa bookelong jwa Charlotte Maxeke Johannesburg Academic Hospita Bao ba dirang ditshupetso ba tshwanetse go dira seno ntle le go gataka ditshwanelo tsa batho ba bangwe, bogolosegolo tsa batho bao ba leng mo tlalelon Ga gona dingongorego dipe tseo di ka dirisang dikgoka le maitsholo a go tshosetsa ba bangwe a re a boneng mo bekeng e e fetileng jaaka maikatlapelo Tshireletsego le pabalesegoKabinete e amogetse le go tshegetsa
trg_text: Group of Seven (G7) SummitCabinet welcomes South Africa s invitation to attend the upcoming G7 Summit in Canad South Africa participated in the summit seven years ago and this invitation is an indication of renewed confidence in the South African econom Our government will seek to use the opportunity to invite investors to inject capital into our econom Investment is necessary for economic growth and job creation on a scale that will significantly reduce current levels of unemploymen South Africa-India 125 Years Anniversary Event As part of the Nelson Mandela and Albertina Sisulu centenary celebrations, Cabinet welcomes the commemoration on 7 June 2018 of Mahatma Gandhi s removal from a train at Pietermaritzburg Station 125 years ag This event spurred Gandhi s philosophy of Satyagraha (truth-force), which had a significant influence on our political leadership and contributed to our liberation struggl 22.

src_text: Kabinete e ikuela mo baaging go dirisa mogala ono wa Crime Stop ka maikarabel Go dirisa mogala ono ka tsela e e seng maleba go ka ama mogala wa boammaruri wa tshoganyetso o o ka bong o pholositse botshelo jwa moth Ba waKabinete e ikuela mo go maAforika Borwa otlhe go tshameka karolo ya bona mo manaaneng le mo diporojekeng tsaa matlafatso ya ba wa mo Kgweding ya Ba wa ka Seetebosig Monongwaga ke ngwagakgolo wa Tata Nelson Rolihlahla Mandela le Mama Albertina Nontsikelelo Sisulu mme Kgwedi eno ya Ba wa ya 2018 e ketekiwa ka moono yo o reng:
trg_text: Condolences2 Cabinet joins President Ramaphosa in sending heartfelt condolences to the family and friends of the five boys who died in a blaze at the Masiya informal settlement in Philippi, Cape TowThe fire also displaced 30 residents of the informal settlemen Government is working hard to ensure that there is housing, security and comfort for all South African Congratulations2 Cabinet wishes African National Congress veteran Baba Andrew Mokete Mlangeni a happy belated birthda Baba Mlangeni celebrated his 93rd birthday on Wednesday, 6 June 2018.

src_text: Tshela botshelo jwa Lefa: go Leba kwa ikonoming ya loago e e maatlafatsang ba wa .Ka go tiisiwa mooko ke lefa la bona le le tlotlometseng, ba wa ba tshwanetswe go maatlafadiwa gore ba kgone go tsaya karolo e e matlhagatlhaga mo go tlhabololeng mafelo ao ba nnang kwa go one ka maitlhomo a go dirisana mmogo gore ba tlhabolole Aforika Borw Puso e dira ka natla go netefatsa gore ba wa ba kgona go fitlhelela tshegetso tsotlhe tse dintsi tse ba di tlhokang mmogo le manaane a thuto a puso a a tla ba kgontshang gore ba tshameke karolo ya bona mo ikonomin Ditlhatlhobo tsa ntlha le tsa fa gare ga ngwagaKabinete e ikuela mo batsading le mo batlhokomeding ba bana go tshegetsa, ka moo ba ka kgonang, bana ba ba kwalang ditlhatlhobo tsa bona tsa ntlha le tsa fa gare ga ngwaga
trg_text: Live the legacy: Towards a socio-economically empowered youth .Inspired by their iconic legacies, young people need to be empowered to take up a more active role in developing their communities with a view to working together to develop South Afric Government is working hard to ensure that youth are able to access the many support and educational government programmes that would enhance their participation in the econom 11.

src_text: tse di kwadiwang naga ka bopharKabinete e leboga go menagane seabe se se botlhokwa seo barutabana ba nnang le sone mo go baakanyetseng baeteledipele ba rona ba ka moso fa mo letlhakoreng le lengwe ba tswelela go dira sebaka se se siametseng go ithuta ga bana ba rona e bile se babalesegil Re rotloetsa gape le barutwana ba rona botlhe go tswelela go ithuta le go semelela go dira ka bojotlhe jwa bonKabinete gape e itumelela go bulwa ga dikolo mo dikarolong tse di farologaneng tsa Bokone Bophirima, go akaretsa Koster le Rustenbur Seno se latela ditshupetso tse di tsereng dibekebeke le dikgoreletso mo makaleng a thuto mo mafelong an Kabinete e ikuela mo batsading, barutwaneng le mo barutabaneng go dirisana mmogo mo go lekeng go tswala sekgala se se bulegileng sa go se rutiwe mme maphata otlhe a tsee maikarabelo ka botlalo mo manaaneng a go leka go tswala sekgala12.
trg_text: Preliminary and mid-term examsCabinet calls on parents and guardians to support, within necessary means, children who are writing preliminary and mid-term examinations taking place across the countr Cabinet warmly appreciates the vital role child caregivers play in shaping our future leaders whilst creating conducive and safe environments for our children to lear We also encourage all learners to continue studying and striving to do their besCabinet also welcomes the reopening of schools in various parts of North West, including Koster and Rustenbur This comes after weeks of protests and disruptions in teaching and learning in the area Cabinet urges parents, learners and teachers to collaborate in trying to recover the lost time and fully commit to catch-up programme Drought and fireCabinet reminds South Africans that the country is still experiencing drough South Africa is one of the 30-driest countries in the world and the lower-than-normal rainfalls have worsened the situatio All people must continue partnering with government to conserve water so as to ensure there is sufficient supply for al As we enter the winter season, Cabinet calls on communities to take extra care to prevent shack and veld fire Government continues to work with communities to promote safety measures at this time when many use various forms of fuel and heating to keep war

src_text: Melelo le komeleloKabinete e gopotsa maAforika Borwa gore naga e santse e tswelela go nna mo komelelon Aforika Borwa ke e nngwe ya dinaga di le 30 mo lefatsheng tse di nang le le ekere mme pula eno e e sa neng jaaka go tlwaetswe e gotetsa molel Batho botlhe ba tshwanetswe go tswelela go dirisana le puso go somarela metsi go netefatsa gore tlamelo ya metsi e lekana botlhJaaka re tsena mo setlheng sa mariga, Kabinete e ikuela mo baaging go nna malalaalaotswe go efoga go tshwarwa ga melelo mo mafelong a megoafatshe le mo melelong ya kwa dinagen Puso e tswelela go dirisana le baagi go ba itsise ka dikgato tsa pabalesego mo nakong eno eo batho ba le bantsi ba dirisang mefuta e e farologaneng ya maokwane ya go ka iphuthumatsa le go futhumatsa mafelo ao ba nnang mo go on
trg_text: The reviewing process seeks to ensure that diversion service providers and diversion programmes are at all times compliant with the minimum standard Six of the chapters have been amended to improve the quality and standards of services provided to children found in conflict with the la Cabinet approved the Regional Engagement Strategy for Biosafety and its implementatio Biotechnology is recognised as an important potential driver of economic growth and a major tool in the fight against hunger and poverty, especially in developing countrie This strategy will facilitate intra-African trade and improve the region s competitiveness in global market It will improve South Africa s collaboration and cooperation within the African regio

src_text: Saense le ThekenolojiKabinete e lemositswe ka ditiragalo tsa lefaufau tse di diragetseng mo bokhutlhong jwa beke e e fetileng moo badiri ba tsa lefaufau bao ba neng ba dira le ba setlamo sa he Catalina Sky Survey kwa Arizona, USA,
trg_text: Cabinet approved the publishing of the 2016/17 survey on government funding for Scientific and Technological Activitie The survey annually monitors the performance of the science and technology sector, and its contribution to South Africa s growth and developmen Cabinet has noted the budget constraints that have resulted in slow growth in R&D expenditure across department

src_text: ba boneng letlapa la kwa lefaufaung (2018 LA) gaufi le sebaka sa Ngwedi, moo morago ga diura di se kae le neng la batla le wela mo LefatshenDitlamorago tsa go phamphologa di bakile makhubu a a kwa tlase a modumo (infrasound) a a neng a phunyeletsa mo lefaufaung moo modumo ono o neng wa utlwiwa ke sedirisiwa sa medumo eno mo Aforika Borwa, seo se neng sa neelwa tiro ya go nna karolo ya Mokgwa wa Bodit habat haba wa go Ela Maemo Tlhoko tebang le Tumelano ya go Kgaotsa Diteko ka Kakaretso tsa DinyutlileSeno se bontsha bokgoni jo bo tlang bo ntse bo gola jwa dipatlisiso tsa segompieno tsa lefaufau go ka bona matlapa a kwa lefaufaung a a tlang a totile Lefatshe le bokgoni jwa Aforika Borwa jo bo itsegeng mo lefatshen
trg_text: Player of the Year award It has been a remarkable year for young Rabada who among other achievements, rose to the No 1 bowling ranking in the world in Test match cricke He is currently the leading wicket-taker for 2018 and also ranked No 7 in One Day International cricke 2 Cabinet welcomes the appointment of Siya Kolisi as the first black captain of the Springbok team for the three match test series against Englan We are confident that he will do South Africa proud as our captain, and will inspire others by his actions and leadership on and off the field of pla 2 Cabinet welcomes the appointment of Finance Minister Nhlanhla Nene as Chairperson of the New Development Bank (NDB) Board of Governor The NDB is a multilateral development bank established by Brazil, Russia, India, China and South Africa (BRICS) in 2014.

src_text: Ditshwetso tsa Kabinete14.

src_text: Kabinete e amogetse go tlisiwa kwa Palamenteng ga pegelo ya 2016/17 e e ka ga tiragatso ya Dipatlisiso le Tlhabololo (R&D) ka ga Manaane a Merokotso ya Lekgeth Lenaane leno la merokotso le kgontshitse ditlamo go oketsa kitso ya tsona mo go R&D, go itirela dithoto le dithata ka botsona le go itlhamela didirisiwa tse dint hw Lenaane leno la merokotso, leo le tsentshitsweng tirisong ka Ngwanaitseele 2006, le tsenngwatirisong ke Lefapha la Saense le Thekenoloji mmogo le Tirelo ya Lekgetho la Aforika Borwa (SARS)
trg_text: The partnership between SASSA and the South African Post Office is yielding positive results as more beneficiaries have since May 2018 been coming forward to swap their cardCabinet urges communities to ignore recent short messages directing social-grant beneficiaries to re-register for their social grants to avoid not being pai Such misleading messages seek to create confusion amongst the poor and derail government from ensuring that social grants are seamlessly paid to beneficiaries without failur 7.

src_text: Kabinete e itumedisiwa ke koketsego ya ditlamo tse di beeletsang mo go R&D mme e tswelela go ikuela mo dikgwebong gore di beeletse go feta fano mo go R&D, e leng seikokotlelo se se botlhokwa mo go godiseng ikonomi ya ron Kabinete e letleletse gore go phasaladiwe dipatlisiso tsa 2016/17 tse di ka ga tlamelo ya puso ka matlole mo Ditirong tsa Saense le Thekenoloj Dipatlisiso tseno ngwaga o mongwe le o mongwe di ela tlhoko maemo a ka fao go diragadiwang ka teng lekala la saense le thekenoloji mmogo le seabe sa lona mo kgolong le mo tlhabololong ya Aforika Borw Kabinete e lemogile dikgoreletso tsa matlole tseo di dirileng gore kgolo ya ikonomi e nne e e loleya mo tirisong ya madi a R&D mo mafapheng otlh
trg_text: Social grants will continue to be paid and the process to replace the old South African Social Security Agency (SASSA) card with the new one will continue until the end of September 2018.

trg_text: Cabinet approved the reviewed Policy Framework for Accreditation of Diversion Services in South Afric The policy framework was put in place in 2010 in line with the Child Justice Act, 2008 (Act 75 of 2008).

src_text: Maitlhomo a thulaganyo ya tshekatshekose wa ke go netefatsa gore baabelani ba ditirelo tsa pharologano mmogo le manaane a pharologano ka dinako tsotlhe a obamela maemo a a tlhomilwen Dikgaolo di le thataro tsa ona di kwalolotswe se wa ka maitlhomo a go tokafatsa boleng le maemo a ditirelo tse di abelwang bana bao go fitlhelwang ba tlodile mola Kabinete e amogetse Togamaano ya Dipuisano mo Kgaolong mabapi le Mokgwa wa Pabalesego ka dirwe tsa mmele le tsela eo e tla tsenngwang tirison Thekenoloji e e laolwang ka dikarolo tsa mmele e bonwa jaaka sedirisiwa se se botlhokwa mo kgolong ya ikonomi gape le go nna sedirisiwa se se botlhokwa thata mo go lwantsheng tlala le khumanego, bogolosegolo mo dinageng tse di santseng di tlhabologTogamaano eno e tla ela tlhoko maemo a kgwebisano ka fa gare ga Aforika le go tokafatsa kgwebisano ya kgaolo mo dimarakeng tsa lefatsh

src_text: wa 2018 gore o phasaladiwe mo Kaseteng gore baagi ba dire ditshwael Maitlhomo a Molaotlhomo ono ke go tlhoma Letlole la NHI la Aforika Borwa, jaaka setheo sa puso, gore e kgone go tlamela ka phitlhelelo ya leruri ya boitekanelo jo bo sa tureng e bile bo na le bolen Gape e tlhalosa tiro ya lona, matla le maikarabelo a letlole lenMolaotlhomo ono o tlamela ka letlhomeso le le mosola la go reka ditirelo tsa boitekanelo ka letlole leno mo legatong la badirisi le go dira dikgato tse di ka ga metswedi ya tiriso e e lekalekanang, e e mosola e bile e tsamaya sentle ya letlole go ka samagana le ditlhokwa tsa boitekanelo tsa badiris Mo bekeng e e tlang Tona ya Boitekanelo o tla tshwara kopano le bobegakgang go tlhalosa Molaotlhomo ono ka botlal Kabinete e amogetse gore go tsenngwe tirisong Molaotlhomo o o Kwalolotsweng Se wa wa Melao ya Saense le Thekenoloji wa 2017 go tlisiwe kwa Palamenten Molaotlhomo ono o baakanya melao ya taolo ya ditiro tsa ditheo mmogo le bolaodi jwa ditheo tsa puso tseo di ikarabelang mo Toneng ya Lefapha la Saense le Thekenoloj Seno se tla dira gore go nne le tolamo mo ditlhokweng tsotlhe mmogo le go netefatsa gore dithulaganyo tsotlhe di a latelw Ditiragalo tse di Tlang20.

src_text: Samiti ya Dinaga di le Supa (G7)Kabinete e amogetse taletso ya Aforika Borwa ya go tsenela Samiti e e tlang ya G7 kwa Canad Aforika Borwa e nnile le seabe mo samiting eno mo dingwageng di le supa tse di fetileng mme taletso eno ke bopaki jwa gore go na le tshepo mo ikonoming ya Aforika BorwPuso ya rona e tla tsaya t hono eno go ka laletsa babeeletsi go tsenya matlole mo ikonoming ya ron Go beeletsa go botlhokwa thata mo kgolong ya ikonomi le mo go tlholeng ditiro mo seemong se se tla fokotsang ka bogale maemo a ga jaana a botlhokatir Moletlo wa Segopotsa sa Dingwaga di le 125 tsa Botsalano jwa Aforika Borwa le IndiaJaaka karolo ya mekete ya ngwagakgolo ya ga Nelson Mandela le Albertina Sisulu, Kabinete e amogela segopotso sa la bo 7 Seetebosigo 2018 sa go folosiwa mo tereneng ga
trg_text: Mr Molelekoa Petrus Mohlomi Mr Odirile Welcome Dingoko Ms Bavelile Gloria Hlongwa Ms Nobom Gcinashe Mfabana Ms Lindie Lankalebalelo Ms Jabu Vuyiswa Mogadime (reappointment); and Dr Tshengedzeni Demana (the dti representative).

src_text: Mahatma Gandhi kwa Setei eneng sa Diterene sa Pietermaritzburg dingwaga di le 125 tse di fetilen Tiragalo eno e ne ya tlhotlheletsa thero ya ga Gandhi e e ka ga Satyagraha (truth-force), e e nnileng le seabe se segolo mo boeteledipeleng jwa sepolotiki le mo go nneng le seabe mo kgaratlhong ya rona ya kgololeseg Leeto la Semmuso la Rephaboliki ya Demokerasi ya Saharawi ArabMoporesitente Cyril Ramaphosa o ne a amogetse molekanekaene wa Rephaboliki ya Demokerasi ya Saharawi Arab, Brahim Ghali, ka la bo 4 Seetebosigo 2018 fa a ne a le mo Leetong la Semmuso mo nagenKabinete e tlhagisitse tshwaraganelo ya yona le batho ba Saharawi mo ntweng ya bona ya go lwela boikemelo mme e ipiletsa mo dinageng tsa bodit habat haba go abelana ka tshegetso e e tlhokagalang mo baaging ba Saharaw Melaetsa23.
trg_text: Dr Matshwenyego Sarah Mohlala Ms Patricia Lindi Tlou; and Ms Anna-Marie Lotter (reappointment as the dti representative).

src_text: Melaetsa ya Matshediso2 Kabinete e ikamanya le Moporesitente Ramaphosa mo go romeleng matshediso a gagwe a kutlobotlhoko kwa balelapa le ditsala tsa basimanyana ba batlhano ba ba tlhokafetseng mo kgabong e e laoditseng megoafatshe kwa Philippi, MotsekapKgabo eno gape e dirile gore batho ba le 30 ba megoafatshe eno ba tlhoke foo ba ka latsang tlhogo gon Puso e semeletse ka natla go netefatsa gore baagi botlhe ba Aforika Borwa ba na le dintlo, ba babalesegile e bile ba tlhabile kgob Melaetsa ya go Akgola2 Kabinete e lakaletsa mogaka wa African National Congress Baba Andrew Mokete Mlangeni masego mo letsatsing la gagwe le le fetileng la matsal Baba Mlangeni o ketekile ngwaga wa bo 93 ka Laboraro, la bo 6 Seetebosigo 2018.
trg_text: Mr Christiaan Johannes van Dyk (Non-Executive Director).Enquiries: Ms Phumla Williams

src_text: E ne e le yo mongwe wa ba ntlha bao ba rometsweng katisong ya sesole kwa ntle ga naga ya Aforika Borwa mme morago ga gore a tshwarwe a boela gae, o ne a bonwa molato mme a atlholelwa kwa kgolegelong botshelo jwa gagwe jotlhe kwa Robben IslandKabiete e akgotse baolara ya setlhopha sa the Proteas Kagiso

src_text: Rabada, yo a neng dira dikgakgamatso kwa Dikabong tsa Motshameko wa Kerikete tsa Aforika Borwa tse di neng di tshwerwe mo malobeng kwa Sandton, Gauten O ne a tlotlwa ka dikabo di le thataro, go akaretsa kabo ya rakirekete le ya motshameki wa ngwaga otlh Ono e nnile ngwaga o o itumedisang mo go Rabada yo gareng ga tse dingwe tse a di fitlheletseng e nnileng go tlhatlhoga go ya mo maemong a bo 1 mo go konopeng go ralala lefatshe lotlhe mo motshamekong wa kerikete wa go Ikatis Ga jaanong ke ene mokonopi yo a di gogang kwa pele mo ngwageng wa 2018 e bile gape o mo maemong a bo 7 mo motshamekong wa kerikete wa Bodit habat haba wa Letsatsi le le Lengw
trg_text: Mr Lulama Lloyd Mayedwa Mr Tom Tshitangano Mr Samuel Mlangeni

src_text: 2 Kabinete e amogetse go thapiwa ga Siya Kolisi mo go nneng mokapotene wa ntlha wa mothomotsho wa setlhopha sa di-Springbok mo lethathameng la metshameko e e latelaneng e le meraro ya go ikatisa kgatlhanong le setlhopha sa Englan Re na le tshepo gore o tla dira gore Aforika Borwa e ipele ka ene jaaka mokapotene wa setlhopha sa rona, le gore ditiro tsa gagwe le boeteledipele jwa gagwe di tla rotloetsa le ba bangwe gape e ka tswa e le bao a tshamekang le bone ka fa lebaleng kgotsa bao ba bogetsengKabinete e amogetse go thapiwa ga Tona ya Matlole Nhlanhla Nene jaaka Monnasetulo wa Boto ya Babusi ba Banka e Nt hwa ya Tlhabololo (NDB).
trg_text: Ms Lerato Herriette Mothae

src_text: NDB ke banka ya ya tlhabololo ya dinagantsi e e tlhomilweng ke dinaga tsa Brazil, Russia, India, China le Aforika Borwa (BRICS) ka ngwaga wa 2014.
trg_text: Ms Fezile Flip Wetes

src_text: E rwesitswe maikarabelo a go kgoboketsa didirisiwa tsa mafaratlhatlha mmogo le go tshegetsa diporojeke tsa tlhabololo ya leruri mo go BRICS le mo diikonoming tse dingwe tse di runyang le mo dinageng tse dingwe tse di tlhabologang, go konosetsa matsapa ditheo tsa matlole tsa dinagantsi le dikgaolo mabapi le kgolo le tlhabololo ya lefatsh Go thapiwaGo thapiwa gotlhe go tla diragadiwa fa makwalothuto otlhe a netefaditswe mme go amogetswe tetlelelo e e matshwaned Go thapiwa se wa ga Rre Ebrahim Mohamed jaaka Mokhomi enara wa Khomi ene ya Naga ya Ditshwanelo tsa Bareki26.
